conversations.content: Longing: Part One
Look at me. Acknowledge me. Love me.
Such things are impossibility to me. I have nothing. No power. No talent. I am bereft of all.
All I have are three older brothers. The third is prideful Prometheus. Although the Primal Flame burns with him, he takes pity upon my inability and pays me some heed.
In contrast are my splendid brothers Atlas and Menoetius. What strength they have! With all their wisdom, power, and magnificence, they couldn't be further from me.
Thus am I unloved. It is akin to spying a pebble on a path. You would not love this pebble, no? That is me.
A life made of love is determined from the moment of birth. Yet so too is a life which lacks it.
I have long believed this, but today was different. I heard something. I chanced upon Atlas and Menoetius discussing me.
At first, I was held rapt to know I even existed in my brothers' world! It was a ray of light in the darkness of my own. Then I came to realize what they were saying.
＂Epimetheus hasn't changed at all.＂ ＂No. He is ever the same as the day we stole away that abhorrent power.＂
My brothers...stole my power? What could this mean?
Is my inability to matter only the fault of my own brothers?
What did I do to deserve such? I do not understand. I cannot. Someone! Anyone! Tell me it's not true!
...I bet HE would tell me. For some reason, he spends time with me. He will surely explain!
Longing: Part Two
Those of incapacity are unloved. Thus I, in my incapacity, am unloved. But is this inability because my power was stolen by my brothers?
No. It is false. A misunderstanding. Yes! Surely he, the one who visits me, will know the truth of it!
＂Tell me, Prometheus. Was it my brothers who robbed me of my power? And did you know of it?＂
＂I care not if you merely pity me. Just please tell me it is all a lie! Surely you at least did your best to love me, did you not?＂
＂...Where did you hear of this? None but we know of it.＂
None...but we. Thus did I come to know how he played a part in this deception as well.
Unforgivable. UNFORGIVABLE!
UNFORGIVABLE! UNFORGIVABLE! UNFORGIVABLE! UNFORGIVABLE! UNFORGIVABLE! UNFORGIVABLE! UNFORGIVABLE! UNFORGIVABLE! UNFORGIVABLE! UNFORGIVABLE!
My resentment knew no bounds. I had no refined words of clemency. I had only a desire to destroy it all. I clenched hatred in both hands and lashed out...
Half my body was scorched by the searing Primal Flame.
He spoke, but I did not hear. I wanted only to disappear, and so I cast his hand aside.
The pain. The agony. The heartache. Oh, how could I have been loved? Did they truly hate my power so?
If such is the truth... Yes. I know now. I ought to bear a new strength! I am certain of it!
Jealousy! Hatred! Despair! THIS will be the fuel of my new strength! THIS will be new power! At last, I have gained the right to be loved as I deserve!
Look upon me, Brother... I have gained new strength. A wonderful power.
B-Brother? Why do you leave again? Is it wrong for me to have strength? Brother, no! Don't...go...
Love me. Please. Oh please...
